segments.text: Looking at this drawing, the kitchen feels so everyday.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, absorbed in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window lights up the scene nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the garden outside looks tidy with those bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the sink is overflowingâ€” that's hilarious she's not seeing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading down like a little waterfall on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool is just too cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so determinedly into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And his sister waiting patiently with her hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a sneaky sibling mission, full of fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The unstable stool adds a bit of excitement to their game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at this mischievous moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even with the water mess, it feels light-hearted.
segments.speaker: PAR
